answerText: Dirac equation[10] The solutions to the Dirac equation are examples of these mathematical objects, which are complex vectors which change sign when they undergo a rotation of 2 pi radians.

question: Question: In one form, this equation states that the imaginary unit times a gamma matrix times the covariant derivative of psi plus mass times the speed of light times psi divided by h-bar equals zero.
